Uses of Class
biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder

    • Uses of CompilerOptionsBuilder in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler

      Methods in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler that return CompilerOptionsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setIeCompatability(boolean ieCompatability)
      Sets whether the CSS code should be compatible with IE browser.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setIncludePaths(List<String> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setMinified(boolean minified)
      Sets whether the CSS code should be minified.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setRelativeUrls(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether the compiler should rewrite relative URLs.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setRootPath(String rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in the CSS code.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setStrictImports(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether the compiler should disallow an @import inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setStrictMath(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether the compiler should try and process all maths in the CSS code.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setStrictUnits(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether the compiler should guess units in the CSS code when it does maths.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder CompilerOptionsBuilder.setUrlsArgument(String urlsArgument)
      Sets an argument which will be added to every URL.
